# Hue

TB dataset countries by average tb incidence -- Alphabetical sort

```{r}
tb <- read_csv("tb.csv")

tb %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarize(Incidence_TB_100k = mean(incidence_100k, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(country, Incidence_TB_100k)) + 
```
